name: RC-AirSim - RC Model Airplane Flight Simulator
description: Learn to fly r/c model airplanes with this realistic flight simulator! RC-AirSim has been used successfully by many r/c pilots to learn how to fly a model airplane. RC-AirSim has more realistic flight dynamics and ground handling than most of the much more expensive r/c airplane flight sims.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: integrated Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
